amendment.description: To clarify the provision prohibiting false or misleading transmission information, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1891 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1891 proposed by Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S13024, S13026-13027; text: CR S13024) To clarify the provision prohibiting false or misleading transmission information, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1891 proposed by Senator Wyden.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1891 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
